title: Cyber Security Certification
subtitle: Master Ethical Hacking & Network Defense
description: Learn to protect systems and networks from cyber threats through real-world tools, ethical hacking, and vulnerability management.

title: Artificial Intelligence Certification
subtitle: AI, Machine Learning & Deep Learning Fundamentals
description: Master AI concepts and techniques to build intelligent systems and applications using real-world datasets and models.

title: Cloud Computing Certification
subtitle: Deploy & Manage Cloud Infrastructure on AWS & Azure
description: Gain expertise in cloud platforms, learn virtualization, and manage scalable solutions using AWS, Azure, and DevOps pipelines.

title: Blockchain Certification
subtitle: Build Secure & Decentralized Blockchain Apps
description: Explore blockchain technology and develop smart contracts and decentralized apps using Ethereum and Solidity.

title: Full Stack Web Development
subtitle: Frontend + Backend Development with MERN Stack
description: Become a full-stack web developer with hands-on training in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express.

title: DevOps Certification
subtitle: Continuous Integration and Delivery with Jenkins & Docker
description: Get trained in CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker, Kubernetes orchestration, and monitoring using tools like Prometheus and Grafana.

title: Data Science with Python
subtitle: Hands-on Data Analysis & Visualization
description: Analyze and visualize data using Python libraries like Pandas, NumPy, Seaborn, and Matplotlib. Build models using real-world datasets.

title: UI/UX Design Certification
subtitle: User-Centered Design with Figma & Adobe XD
description: Learn UI/UX principles, create wireframes, prototypes, and design interfaces for web and mobile apps with industry-leading tools.
